014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.internal;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.lang.reflect.Method;
018
019import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.Call;
020import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.OutParameter;
021import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.OutParameterList;
022import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.SqlStatementCustomizer;
023import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.SqlStatementCustomizerFactory;
024
025public class OutParameterListFactory implements SqlStatementCustomizerFactory {
026    @Override
027    public SqlStatementCustomizer createForMethod(Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType, Method method) {
028        final OutParameterList outParams = (OutParameterList) annotation;
029
030        return stmt -> {
031            Call call = (Call) stmt;
032            for (OutParameter outParam : outParams.value()) {
033                call.registerOutParameter(outParam.name(), outParam.sqlType());
034            }
035        };
036    }
037}
